functions-question3_key2: This question is in 2 parts. Submit the code of both the parts by writing them in the same file.
functions-question3_key4: Write a function named add_numbers which takes two numbers as arguments and then prints their sum. The name of the arguments should be number1 and number2.
functions-question3_key8: Write a function named add_numbers_list which takes 2 lists of two integers and then prints the sum of the integers with the same position.
functions-question3_key9: Use the add_numbers function given in Part 1 to count 2 integers that have the same position.
